summary: This bill, the Preventing Fraudulent ICE Impersonation Act of 2025, aims to enhance penalties for unauthorized use and sale of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) apparel and insignia. It prohibits individuals from impersonating ICE officers and restricts the sale of ICE-branded items without authorization. The bill mandates public awareness campaigns, a national reporting mechanism, and a study on impersonation of immigration officials. It also includes provisions for seizure, forfeiture, and sentencing enhancements.
